FuncDef:
The pki domain command creates a PKI domain and displays the PKI domain view.
The undo pki domain command deletes the PKI domain.
By default, no PKI domain is created.

ParaDef.Info:
Indicates the name of the PKI domain.
It is a string of 1 to 31 case sensitive characters.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
Before you apply for a certificate, run the pki domain command to create a PKI domain.
Modifying the domain configuration may end the certificate request task and cause a certificate obtain failure.
